subject.topcClas: Sociology of labour, sociology of enterprise

stdyInfo.abstract: The data has been gathered in order to analyse newspaper delivery labour by focusing on two Slovenian companies: the media company Dnevnik and the distribution company Izberi. In response to the enduring trend of declining readership, Dnevnik attempted to cut its delivery costs by transferring the delivery activity to a rival company Izberi, a move met with resistance from deliverers adversely affected by the transfer. Building primarily on labour process theory the purpose of data gathering was to identify the economic rationalisation techniques used to reduce the costs of delivery labour, discipline the workforce and respond to the newspaper deliverers’ resistance to these techniques.

sumDscr.universe: Newspaper deliverers of Dnevnik, representatives of trade unions of the media company Dnevnik, representatives of the companies Dnevnik, d.d., and Izberi, d.o.o.

dataColl.dataCollector: Center za raziskovanje družbenega komuniciranja = Social Communication Research Centre
dataColl.sampProc: Non-probability: Purposive. Non-probability: Respondent-assisted. Newspaper deliverers were included by the snowball method. Other respondents were invited according to their function in Dnevnik, d.d. and Izberi, d.o.o.
dataColl.collSitu: First contacts of newspaper deliverers were provided by a representative of the Association of Free Trade Unions of Slovenia, who helped in organizing collective action (resistance of newspaper deliverers). Sampling continued on by using the snowball method. Interviewees that were sampled purposively (representatives of trade unions of the media company Dnevnik, representatives of the media companies Dnevnik, d.d., and Izberi, d.o.o), were contacted by using publicly accessible contacts (e-mail, telephone). The willingness to cooperate of all of the interviewees to cooperate was high. On average, the interviews lasted a good hour.
dataColl.cleanOps: The data were cleaned for out of range values before deposited.

method.stdyClas: 7: studies that permits theoretical generalisations or relates on a practical problem, less influential
